attributes.action: request the US Government, and President Obama in particular, for the immediate release of Binyam Mohamed from Guantanamo and welcome him into the UK. All terrorist charges were dropped last year, so there is no legitimate reason to prolong this man's detention.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This innocent man has suffered horribly, seemingly with UK complicity, and his immediate release should be a top priority. The question of 'who did what' can be argued after his release.
Binyam is apparently on 'hunger strike' at present, so speed is essential.

rejection.details: This petition is now out of date.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
